attributes.action: High Treason Should be followed by Capital Punishment
attributes.additional_details:
Why should we live in a so called "Great" Britain that does not correctly prosecute those who would assisinate a member of the royal household and interfere with a near 1000 year line of succesion; instead to only achieve a whole life sentence. I deem it holy unruly that our nation can be violated in such a disgraceful manner and those who have commited the crime not to be tried and have the possibility of capital punishment.

I feel that if one person whever they hold British citizenship or not commit high treason then they should be sentenced to death.
Therefore if you are a proud patriot and are proud of The United Kingdom then I call upon you stand up for The Queen and Country and sign this pettition so that our monarchy cannot be interfered with and minipulated.
